*** Test Cases ***

Log Levels
    Set log level  TRACE
    Log with all levels
    [Teardown]  Set log level  INFO

Timestamps are accurate
    Log messages different time

Log HTML
    Set log level  DEBUG
    Log HTML
    [Teardown]  Set log level  INFO

Write messages to console
    Write messages to console
